item.title: 用独立申请与人口贩运作斗争
大规模攻击将音乐会变成面部识别监视实验
显示HN：Pooshit - 将本地代码同步到远程Docker容器
item.description:
发音为push-it .... 我在大多数情况下是懒惰的开发人员，所以这是给像我这样的人。 Sometimes I just want my local code running in live remote containers quickly, without building images and syncing to cloud docker repos or setting up git workflows or any of the other draining ways to get your code running remotely.With pooshit (and a simple config file), you can simply push your local dev files to a remote folder on a VM then automatically remove relevant running containers, then build and run an updated container with one command line call.It works well with如您可以在pooshit_config files中指定docker运行参数。
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=452555337 点：38 ＃评论：28
